subject: Murders and Attempted Murders
Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Ms. Steinhagen’s 1949 shooting of the Phillies’ Eddie Waitkus made its way into the novel “The Natural” and its film adaptation.
snippet: Ms. Steinhagen’s 1949 shooting of the Phillies’ Eddie Waitkus made its way into the novel “The Natural” and its film adaptation.
